title: Episode 2: Rewards and Punishments
description:
Today’s Question: “Do you believe in spanking children to get to them to behave?” We’ll look at this issue along with a few others in this podcast.

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
content:encoded: Today’s Question: “Do you believe in spanking children to get to them to behave?” We’ll look at this issue along with a few others in this podcast. Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
itunes:subtitle: Join host Michael Britt in examining how rewards and punishments operate in our lives.
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
itunes:author: Michael Britt
